Login.title: Login to your account
Login.subtitle: Enter your email & password to login

CreateAccount.title: Create an account
CreateAccount.subt: Enter email & password to create an account

ForgotPassword.title: Reset Password
ForgotPassword.subtitle: Provide the email address you use to log in to the application - we will send you an instructions for resetting your password

HomeScreen.nfcCardSubtitle: Hold your device near a NFC Tag
HomeScreen.timeZoneMatches: The time zone matches your location:
HomeScreen.importantNotice: Please set Phone's Date and Time to automatic to continue using the app

ChangePasswordScreen.confirmationCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel password change?
ChangePasswordScreen.changeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to change your password?

UserProfileScreen.title: User Profile
UserProfileScreen.cancelConfirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel? All unsaved changes will be lost.
UserProfileScreen.rusure: Are you sure you want to remove your profile photo?
UserProfileScreen.FailedToRemove: Failed to remove profile photo. Please try again.
UserProfileScreen.confirmAccountRemovalDesc: Are you sure you want to remove the account? This action cannot be undone.
UserProfileScreen.langConfig: Configuring the language of messages from the app to me
UserProfileScreen.notificationLanguage: Select the langugage in which you want to recevie messages

ResetPassword.passwordResetSuccess: We have emailed your password reset link!

Toast.AccountCreatedSuccessfullSubtitle: We will send further information by email
Toast.ErrorUpdatingProfile: There was an error updating the Profile
Toast.ErrorRemovingProfilePhoto: There was an error removing the Profile Photo
Toast.ValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
Toast.Cannotendwork: Cannot end work before starting it
Toast.Cannottakebreak: Cannot take break before starting work

TimeLog.title: Time Log
TimeLog.nohistory: You have no work history for today

Loading.PassWait: Making sure your password is secure!

Offline.FeatureNotAvailable: Feature not available in offline mode
Offline.CantLogout: Cannot logout while you have ongoing work
Offline.CantLogoutDescription: You are offline, you cannot logout while you have ongoing work time. Quit your work to log out.
Offline.AskToLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
Offline.ExplainLogout: Once you are in offline mode, you will not be able to log in again until you have access to the internet.

timeSyncError.title: Time Synchronization Error
timeSyncError.description: Your device's time is set earlier than the server time, which is not allowed. This discrepancy suggests your device time may have been manually altered.
timeSyncError.instructions_intro: To ensure accurate functionality and security, please enable automatic date and time settings in your device:
timeSyncError.instruction_step2: Enable 'Automatic date and time' (or 'Set time automatically')
timeSyncError.warning: The app will not function until this is corrected.

NotificationScreen.confirmArchiveBody: Are you sure you want to move {{count}} selected message to the archive?
NotificationScreen.confirmArchiveBody_plural: Are you sure you want to move {{count}} selected messages to the archive?
NotificationScreen.confirmMarkBody: Are you sure you want to mark {{count}} selected message as {{status}}?

ArchiveScreen.title: Archives
ArchiveScreen.confirmDeleteBody: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected message?
ArchiveScreen.confirmDeleteBody_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected messages?
ArchiveScreen.confirmRestoreBody: Are you sure you want to restore {{count}} selected message?
ArchiveScreen.confirmRestoreBody_plural: Are you sure you want to restore {{count}} selected messages?

NotificationService.permissionsDeniedMessage: You won't receive notifications until enabled. Go to Settings > Notifications > EDA - Time Tracker to allow notifications.
NotificationService.errorMessage: Failed to request notification permissions. Please enable in Settings > Notifications > EDA - Time Tracker
